attributes.action: Increase the Council Tax discount for single people to 50%.
attributes.background: It is unfair that single people have to pay 75% council tax whilst, in theory, a couple sharing bills would only pay 50% each. I believe it discourages independence, and should be fair for all and a single occupant should only have to pay 1/2 the full Council Tax amount.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require local councils to offer a 50% single person discount for council tax
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568095
